snippet.title: Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2 - Revelations DLC Trailer
snippet.description:
Take a look at the upcoming Revelations DLC for Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2.

Follow Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2 at GameSpot.com!
http://www.gamespot.com/castlevania-lords-of-shadow-2/
Official Site - http://www.konami-castlevania.com/

Check out our review!
Watch - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VWFP9rOifPk
Read - http://www.gamespot.com/reviews/castlevania-lords-of-shadow-2-review/1900-6415677/

Visit all of our channels:
